sentences.sContent: ...a magic potion that will make Siegfried forget Brunnhilde and fall in love with Gutrune.
sentences.sCn: …一种会使齐格弗里德忘掉布伦希德尔德而爱上古特鲁内娜的魔剂。

remMethod.val: 可以和portion (一份) 结合起来记

trans.tranOther: A potion is a drink that contains medicine, poison, or something that is supposed to have magic powers
